description: A wide variety of forest conditions may be viewed .It takes about one hour to walk the 1.65K trail as it wanders through old field white spruce stands, vigorous young plantations and natural wet land . Just an all round nice walk in the woods.
directions: The Auburn Demonstration Woodlot is located on Route #213 near Fort Augustus N46 17.505 W62 54.481
title: Auburn Demonstration Woodlot
